description: The SportsJS Soccer schema contains properties common to Motor Racing.

motorRacingEventMetadata.description: Metadata about the event itself. | Includes what state the game is in.

motorRacingTeamMetadata.description: Metadata about the team. | Specific to the sport of motor racing.

motorRacingPlayerMetadata.description: Metadata about the driver. | Specific to the sport of motor racing.

motorRacingAssociateMetadata.description: Metadata about the associate. | Specific to the sport of motor racing.

motorRacingMetadataVehicle.description: Details on the car, motorcycle, etc., being driven. | Includes manufacturing information.

number.description: The number written on the side of the vehicle.

makeKey.description: A unique identifier for the make of the car. For example: m.dodge

sponsor.description: The name of the sponsor for the car.

motorRacingTeamStats.description: Specific statistics for motor racing. | Includes stats about the qualifying round, as well as for the race itself.

motorRacingPlayerStats.description: Specific statistics for motor racing. | Includes stats about the qualifying round, as well as for the race itself.

baseMotorRacingPlayerStats.description: Specific statistics for motor racing. | Includes stats about the qualifying round, as well as for the race itself.

motorRacingEventStats.description: Statistics about the event itself. | Includes the total number of lead changes, and the average speed.

speedAverageRace.description: The average speed of the race.

speedUnits.description: The units used for speed-average. For example: mph.

leadChanges.description: The number of times the lead changed in this race.

leadChangesDrivers.description: Total number of drivers that comprised the lead changes.

marginOfVictory.description: Time behind leader for 2nd place driver.

cautionFlags.description: Total number of flags for race.

cautionFlagsLaps.description: Total number of laps there were caution flags.

lapsTotal.description: Total number of laps for race.

distanceUnits.description: Unit of measure for distance-lap and distance-total.

motorRacingStatsQualifying.description: Statistics for the qualifying round of a race. | Includes pole position and qualifying times.

grid.description: The arrangement or order of cars in the starting lineup.

polePosition.description: Position relative to the inside wall, at the start of the race.

poleWins.description: Number of times this driver or team had a pole position of 1.

qualifyingSpeed.description: Speed of lap which qualified the driver.

qualifyingPosition.description: Where the car had ranked within the preliminary round.

motorRacingStatsRace.description: Statistics for the race itself. | Includes time information and can include cumulative stats for the driver or team.

timeBehindLeader.description: Amount of time this driver was behind the car that is currently in first place.

lapsBehindLeader.description: Amount of laps this driver was behind the car that is currently in first place.

timeAheadFollower.description: Amount of time this driver was ahead of the car immediately behind it.

lapsAheadFollower.description: Amount of laps this driver was ahead of the car immediately behind it.

time.description: Total amount of time this driver has been competing in the race.

points.description: Total accumulation of points in the league-authorized standings for the season.

pointsRookie.description: Total accumulation of points in the league-authorized standings for the season, amongst other drivers who are competing in their first year.

bonus.description: Amount of bonus points driver has earned in this race. For example, NASCAR drivers may receive five bonus points for leading a lap, and an additional five points for leading the most laps.

lapsCompleted.description: Number of laps this driver has completed during this race.

lapsLeadingTotal.description: Number of laps in which this driver has led the field.

distanceLeading.description: Distance (in, say, miles or kilometers) that driver has led the race.

distanceCompleted.description: Distance (in, say, miles or kilometers) that driver has completed in this race.

distanceUnits.description: The unit of measure used for distances.

speedUnits.description: Units used for denoting the speed.

status.description: Whether the driver is running, or is out of the race.

finishesTop5.description: Number of top-5 finishes this driver has had.

finishesTop10.description: Number of top-10 finishes this driver has had.

starts.description: Number of races this driver had started.

finishes.description: Number of races this driver had finished.

nonFinishes.description: Number of races this driver had started but had not finished.

wins.description: Number of races this driver had won.

racesLeading.description: Number of races in which this driver has held a lead.

money.description: Amount of money this driver had won.

moneyUnits.description: Units in which the money attribute is specified.

leadsTotal.description: Number of total leads this driver has had, presumably during this race.

comment.description: A comment or highlight on this driver.

motorRacingStatsLap.description: Statistics for a particular lap. | Can be used for all laps in a race, or just say for the fastest lap.

startTimeElapsed.description: The time since the start of the race at which this lap was begun.

speedAverageLap.description: The average speed of this lap.

duration.description: The length of time this lap (or partial lap) was completed.

splitLocation.description: Used when partial laps are being timed. If omitted, it is assumed that the stats herein are for the entire lap. Sample values include: start | stretch | finish | marker-1 | marker-2

lap.description: An integer. 1,2,3,4 for the current lap that (generally) the leader of the race is amidst.

lapsRemaining.description: The number of laps (generally for the leader) that are remaining in the race.

timeElapsed.description: The time elapsed in the race.

flagState.description: The current flag issued within the race.
